bibl.title: The Opening Line of Menander, Dis exapaton.
bibl.note: "Since my discussion of the opening words of Dis exapaton [Female Speech in Menander, Antichthon 18 (1984) pp. 24-42] has escaped R. Nünlist [P. Mich. inv. 6950 (unpubliziert), P. Köln 203 und 243: Szenen aus Menanders Dis Exapaton?, ZPE 99 (1993) pp. 245-278 et pll. III-V], it seems worthwhile restating and expanding my arguments. 'Bacchis' cannot be excluded as a possible speaker of the words in question."
